column5: My spacious home is only a 5 minute drive from downtown and Schlitterbahn. Historic Gruene is a 10 minute drive. Use the gourmet kitchen or you can visit several great eateries close by. I have an extra room and air mattress for larger parties. My friendly cat, Scooter, will probably greet you before I do when you come in the door. The neighborhood is very quiet and the neighbors are extremely friendly.
column8: Comfy New Home with Private Bed and Shared Bath
